name: Vision of Voodress
tooltip:
Vision of VoodressLevel 60

You and Maywiki have something in common, mon. We both be <class>! Although, Maywiki is more of a mystic and you be more of a scrub. Still, we both know what the great spirits bring.

As a gift I give to you this orb to wear around your neck. Look deep inside and see the village of Voodress in the South Seas! Let it lift your spirits!
